com.impossibl.postgres.types

Class Registry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.impossibl.postgres.types.Registry

  • public class Registry
extends Object
    Storage and loading for all the known types of a given context.
    Author:
    kdubb

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getLatestKnownTypeId

        public int getLatestKnownTypeId()

      • update

        public void update(Collection<PgType.Row> pgTypeRows,
          Collection<PgAttribute.Row> pgAttrRows,
          Collection<PgProc.Row> pgProcRows)
        Updates the type information from the given catalog data. Any information not specifically mentioned in the given updated data will be retained and untouched.
        Parameters:
        pgTypeRows - "pg_type" table rows
        pgAttrRows - "pg_attribute" table rows
        pgProcRows - "pg_proc" table rows
